snippet.title: MX Unleashed - Xbox Gameplay (Xbox One Re-Release)
snippet.description:
MX Unleashed is not only the last game in THQ's MX trilogy (MX 2002 and MX Superfly came out before it), but for Rainbow Studios' popular MX vs ATV series, this is where it all began. 

Released in 2004, this is one of the games that's backward compatible with the Xbox One. It was supposed to get a PS4 re-release, but considering how Sony Interactive Entertainment basically gave up on PS2 games and instead began focusing on bringing PSone and PSP games to the PS Plus Premium library, plans for the PS4 re-release with trophies and remote play were scrapped. Same happened with PS4 re-releases of PS2 versions of Stuntman Ignition and both Splashdown 1 and 2.

MX Unleashed (C) THQ Nordic
Developed by Rainbow Studios
Also available on PlayStation 2 and Java-based mobile phones

#mxunleashed #xbox #xbox2001 #originalxbox #xboxoriginal #ogxbox #retrogames #retrogaming #xboxonebackwardcompatibility #backwardcompatibility #thqnordic #mxvsatv
